message: Let's start fair.  I'm offering you 40% of the money.  We can adjust later if you think it's not fair.
My turn. I'll take a bit more this time, considering the inflation.  Let's settle this quickly.
I understand inflation is happening, but let's be reasonable.  This is a fair split considering the new values.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  We both lose out if this drags on.
